speaker: President.
english: President. The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0302/2006 ) by Mr Varela Suanzes-Carpegna, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on economic and trade relations between the EU and Mercosur with a view to the conclusion of an Interregional Association Agreement ( 2006/2035(INI) ).
original: President. The next item is the debate on the report ( A6-0302/2006 ) by Mr Varela Suanzes-Carpegna, on behalf of the Committee on International Trade, on economic and trade relations between the EU and Mercosur with a view to the conclusion of an Interregional Association Agreement ( 2006/2035(INI) ).
agenda_item: EU economic and trade relations with Mercosur (debate)
